name: HomeRise
description: HomeRise’s mission is to help people experiencing homelessness secure housing and become self-sufficient. HomeRise is an outcomes-focused nonprofit that fulfills its mission by developing and managing high quality supportive housing and providing services to individuals, seniors and families experiencing homelessness to help them rise up and rebuild their lives and break the cycle of homelessness.
